mapper.select: SELECT A.C_NAME, B.M_NO, B.M_NAME, B.M_EMAIL, B.M_PHONE, C.J_NO, C.J_NAME, D.D_NO, D.D_NAME, E.P_NAME, A.C_NO, CASE F.A_STATE WHEN '퇴근' THEN '출근전' WHEN '휴가' THEN '휴가중' ELSE '근무중' END AS A_STATE FROM COMPANY A JOIN MEMBER B ON A.C_NO = B.C_NO JOIN JOB C ON B.J_NO = C.J_NO JOIN DEPT D ON B.D_NO = D.D_NO JOIN PHOTO E ON B.P_NO = E.P_NO JOIN ATTENDANCE F ON B.M_NO = F.M_NO WHERE F.A_ENT_DATE = '2022-05-23' AND A.C_NO = #{cNo} ORDER BY C.J_NO DESC

SELECT A.C_NAME, B.M_NO, B.M_NAME, B.M_EMAIL, B.M_PHONE, C.J_NO, C.J_NAME, E.P_NAME, A.C_NO, CASE F.A_STATE WHEN '퇴근' THEN '출근전' WHEN '휴가' THEN '휴가중' ELSE '근무중' END AS A_STATE FROM COMPANY A JOIN MEMBER B ON A.C_NO = B.C_NO JOIN JOB C ON B.J_NO = C.J_NO JOIN PHOTO E ON B.P_NO = E.P_NO JOIN ATTENDANCE F ON B.M_NO = F.M_NO WHERE F.A_ENT_DATE = '2022-05-23' AND A.C_NO = #{cNo} AND B.M_MANAGER = 'Y' ORDER BY C.J_NO DESC
SELECT DISTINCT A.D_NAME FROM DEPT A JOIN MEMBER B ON A.D_NO = B.D_NO WHERE B.C_NO = 1

SELECT A.C_NAME, B.M_NO, B.M_NAME, B.M_EMAIL, B.M_PHONE, C.J_NO, C.J_NAME, E.P_NAME, A.C_NO, CASE F.A_STATE WHEN '퇴근' THEN '출근전' WHEN '휴가' THEN '휴가중' ELSE '근무중' END AS A_STATE FROM COMPANY A JOIN MEMBER B ON A.C_NO = B.C_NO JOIN JOB C ON B.J_NO = C.J_NO JOIN PHOTO E ON B.P_NO = E.P_NO JOIN ATTENDANCE F ON B.M_NO = F.M_NO WHERE F.A_ENT_DATE = '2022-05-23' AND A.C_NO = #{cNo} AND B.M_NO = #{mNo}
